      • getSelectorName

        public java.lang.String getSelectorName(java.lang.String elementName,
                               java.lang.String id)
        Gives the selector name for the passed "element" name, with the passed id
        Parameters:
        elementName - The name of the element for this selector.
        id - The id of the selector.
        Returns:
        The concatenated string describing the name of this selector.

      • getDescendantName

        public java.lang.String getDescendantName(java.lang.String baseSelectorName,
                                 java.lang.String descendant)
        Returns the selector name for the passed "base" selector name, and the passed "descendant" selector name
        Parameters:
        baseSelectorName - The name of the base selector.
        descendant - The name of the selector that is descendant from this base selector.
        Returns:
        A String describing the concatenated name.
